title: Ramdev's Sexist Remarks Spark Outrage: Women's Panel Demands Apology
content:
Yoga guru Ramdev's controversial remarks about women's clothing have sparked widespread outrage. During a recent event, Ramdev made a comment suggesting that women look good in any attire, even if they wear nothing, prompting a strong reaction from the Delhi Commission for Women. 

The commission, led by Swati Maliwal, demanded a public apology from Ramdev, calling his remarks "indecent and condemnable." Maliwal highlighted the hurt caused to all women by the statement and urged Ramdev to apologize to the nation. 

Adding fuel to the fire, Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Raut questioned Amruta Fadnavis's silence on the matter, highlighting the hypocrisy of enacting women's protection laws while simultaneously tolerating such inappropriate behavior. The incident has sparked a debate about the need for accountability and respect for women in public discourse.
author: Scroll Staff
